description: This template provides a solid starting point for building modern web applications with TypeScript and React.

home.heroDescription: Modern computer vision that supports clinicians and laboratories with rapid, consistent assessments of blood smear images.
home.disclaimer: Not a medical device. For research and educational evaluation only.

features.fasterTriageBody: Prioritize patients with rapid AI-assisted signal to support initial decisions.
features.labWorkflowBody: Reduce repetitive screening and improve throughput without sacrificing quality.
features.educationBody: Visual explanations and examples help students and researchers explore smear patterns.

commitment.title: Clinician-first, privacy by design
commitment.body: Designed to assist—not replace—experts. We focus on transparent behavior, clear limitations, and human oversight at every step.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.subtitle: Interested in pilots, partnerships, or research collaboration?

demo.title: Demo: Analyze a Blood Smear Image
demo.subtitle: Follow the steps below to preview how the app works. Runs locally in your browser.

steps.overviewBody: Follow the guided steps to see how analysis works using example images.

demo.progressNote: Simulated client-side demo. Not for diagnostic use.
demo.noResult: No result yet. Complete steps 1–3 and click Analyze.

common.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this course?

welcome_to_platform: Welcome to the Online Learning Platform!
